common.Data handler exception. Please, refresh: Data handler exception. Please, refresh the page and retry.

common.Leave empty if you want your budget to b: Leave empty if you want your budget to be unlimited
common.Please wait while your changes are updat: Please wait while your changes are updated in our system. This can take up to 10 minutes.

No rows selected. Please use the checkboxes to select the rows to edit.
You can also select all rows on this page or all rows across all pages

common.Your banner ad will appear on the browse: Your banner ad will appear on the browser homepage of users that have previously searched for your targeted keywords. You will only be charged if a user clicks on your ad.
common.Your banner ad will only be displayed to: Your banner ad will only be displayed to users who are interested in targeted topics or categories.
common.Only users in specific cities or locatio: Only users in specific cities or locations will see your banner ad. This option is helpful if you only sell your product or service in limited markets.
common.Ad scheduling allows you to choose speci: Ad scheduling allows you to choose specific dates and times (by hour) when your banner ad will be displayed. You can use this option if your customers tend to buy more of your product at a specific time of day.
common.Your banner ad will only be displayed to: Your banner ad will only be displayed to users who fit targeted age and/or gender demographics.
common.Your ad will appear on the browser homep: Your ad will appear on the browser homepage of users who previously visited websites that have similar products to yours.
Your ad will appear on the browser homepage of users who previously visited your websites.
common.When users search for targeted keywords: When users search for targeted keywords related to your product, your ad will be displayed on the search results page. You will only be charged if a user clicks on your ad.
common.Leave empty if you do not want to set a: Leave empty if you do not want to set a time limit
common.The alo button will appear on search eng: The alo button will appear on search engine result page (Alo show in Advert) and on your landing page (Alo show on site)

common.End time is earlier than start time: End time is earlier than start time

common.Ad scheduling allows you to choose speci: Ad scheduling allows you to choose specific dates and times (by hour) when your ad will be displayed. You can use this option if your customers tend to buy more of your product at a specific time of day.
